roleset.name: generally clumsy, cumbersome, uncomfortable

example.name: arg1
example.text: I had mine pierced with a straight stud , it was flipping awkward .

example.text: That standing ovation was extremely awkward, wasn't it?

example.name: both args
example.text: I am awkward at anything resembling line dancing.
